pageContext.claim: “Economic growth last quarter was 4.2 percent. And as you people know, it was headed down. Big. And it was a low number. A very low number.”
pageContext.analysis: GDP growth was 4.2 percent in the second quarter of 2018, but Trump is totally wrong in claiming GDP growth was "headed down." The U.S. economy has grown steadily since the end of the Great Recession.
